attributes.action: let Colby School have their once a week sweetie fundraising tuck shop back!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sweets and sugary items have been banned from school tuck shops.  At our school the School Council run a once a week fundraising tuck shop - we have a Healthy Tuck on all the other days of the week, so we think we deserve our tuck back!  We have the National Healthy School Status and are an incredibly energetic school too.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
